title: 10MIN everyday full body hourglass pilates workout // no equipment // beginner friendly
description:
some mornings i dont have time for more so this full body is perfect for those days! love love looove working out outside 

Hope you have fun doing this workout! 

Love u all
Lidi

⇩MORE OF ME⇩
TikTok | http://bit.ly/3jKm4Bo
Instagram | http://bit.ly/3jLe4A4
Youtube | http://bit.ly/3vvvCCP
Email | hi@lidiavmera.com
channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions

OFFICIALLY ONE MONTH!! differences ive seen: slimming of stomach and less bloating, thigs have a more noticeable gap. ive been drinking a celery and spinach drink 4x a week as well! lost 3 pounds (111->108!)
day 32: done!
day 33: done! added weights

like to remind me!
I love how calm her workout videos are while I'm crying doing it in my room

That was my first go at a Pilates workout! It was pretty difficult for me as I don’t have a lot of strength and am overweight but I tried to just go slow and focus on my breathing because I heard it’s more about small controlled movements not how fast you can do them! Great workout!👏🏻

Here's a tip:
When you feel like giving up, close your eye and just focus on the music (pretend to sleep, it helps)
BREATHE! Please remember to breathe!
It's ok to pause the video and take a break 💖💖

august 13: ✓ so today i tried something different, i made a routine a few weeks ago (using elliptical & weight machines) started with 20-30min of elliptical, then weight machines mostly arms exercises and then i would do this 10min video. today i started doing the video and felt stronger, today i felt proud of how i executed every move, i guess now this is my new routine. DAY TEN DONE!
august 14: ✘ started uni today and feel very tired. I will rest for today, and tomorrow I will be back with my routine😊
august 15: ✓ rest day was amazing and today came back recharged, it felt so easy! im so happy. day 12 done!
august 16: ✓ easyyy! day 13 done <3 <3 <3

august 18: ✓ started very early today! i woke up and went straight to do this 10 min vid. day 15 done!
august 19: ✓ it felt really easy today, day 16 done♡♡♡
august 20: ✓ DAY 17 DONE, i always feel so amazing after doing this video i looooove it♡
⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙ UPDATE ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙ the changes im seeing are mostly in my waist(getting smaller) cause for me everytime i start doing a workout is the same( i start with my stomach getting smaller MOST than my legs and other body parts). but the thing i love the most is that i feel with more energy through the day, i can move better (like walk faster or longer without getting tired). but like i said before, im not only doing this 10min video alone. im complimenting with 20minutes of elliptical and some weight machines for my arms. I noticed that im losing size but not weight.. (even tho im fasting since 7pm to 9am). ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙⟡♡⋆˙ UPDATE ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙⟡♡ ⋆˙

september 10: ✓ Hi, it's been a while and felt like i wanted to do this again.. (it has been a little harder for me to keep working out bc of uni, and art projects. i think that my career is going great cause i´ve been getting some offers and i am very happy.) Just wanted to say that life is about up and downs but everyone can start over. i have missed this, cause it makes me feel so great.
we'll see if i keep doing this routine or if im going to try another video. thank u to every single person that left me a comment ! 💗 and to the ones that reached me out on insta too!! 💗

🎅🎄🎁☃🦌HELLO, today is Wednesday (December 27) and i came here to say that i've been struggling to start over.. for a bunch of stuff from my personal life but i've never stopped wanting to, the biggest inspiration has been you ladies, every comment has my heart💗💗 i cannot thank you enough, i would love to chat with every single one of you and im very sorry to the ones that i never wrote back (i went trough a lot of mental stuff) so i didn't had the strenght. mentally and physically. LOVE YOU ALL! HERE I COME AGAIN🦌☃🎁🎄🎅

November 22, 2024.
I haven't had the motivation to share my process, i guess that all this attention is a little overwhelming so that's why i stopped giving updates even tho i have come back to this video like I've had said it before...
But no one knows me so it really shouldn't affect that much..
truth is, starting the month of april i went to therapy for the first time in my life, i thought that i was doing so much work and then some other stuff happened in my life so i had to stop going, bc i don't want to be a burden. I have learned so much this year, is been harsh. I'll try to keep up with updates cause it used to make me happy, specially connecting and helping with you!

hey! is a new year🎉 i haven't updated you, but i started in january 2025 again!!
i did two weeks and the i stopped, so i began all over again in february

Just wanted to say that i always come back to this video cause when i started doing this routine i noticed that for the first time in my life.. finally found something that helped me losing weight.
That's why all of the updates. And with consistency my body changed a lot (aug-sept 2023). this past months i haven't been that consistent but still has helped to make me feel comfortable in my own skin.

thank u to every person that is leaving me comments, you all are so sweet 💗 makes me want to keep going! 💗

if u want to ask me anything about this beautiful process, here is my instagram⭐@michuuuh⭐
